availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, gas and plumping company. Operated from 1851 to 1864. Owner(s): Thomas Williams and George Brobston.

ab.bibl:
Henry Tanner, ed., The Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1859-60 (Louisville, KY: Maxwell & Co, 1859), p. 248.
"New Gas Fitting and Plumbing Establishment," The Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, KY), August 18, 1851, p. 2.
"Thomas Williams (1813-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial 182703852, accessed December 15, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/182703852.
